pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stargazer is a powerful (inter)net billing system, capable of gathering traffic statistics from many sources (such as NetFlow protocol, ethernet packets capture, or IPQ subsystem), managing and billing user accounts according to specified fees and rules (including time-based rules, traffic source/destination rules and a payoff system). This ebuild allows you to compile it yourself depending of your needs.
